subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus
author: Bryan Whatley
full_text:
--0-560706151-1218546631=:74864
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Hi Debbie,
   I think the Ovilus is similar to the Paranormal Puck.  What it does is take constant evironmental readings off the sensors inside it, does some math on them, then based off the result, assigns it to a word from a list of words it knows.  That word is then output through a speakjet microchip that you hear.
   I could be wrong though, but from my techie point of view...it's pretty darn cool. :)
All the best,
Bryan  



----- Original Message ----
From: "Fransen, Debbie" <debbie.fransen@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, August 12, 2008 7:41:17 AM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus


I don't know how 
many of the members watch Paranormal State, but they used
a new piece of 
equipment called The Ovilus. You guys have got to check this
out. Go to www.digitaldowsing. com. I am not really 
sure who these guys are, and
where they came up 
with this. To me, it sounds kind of like Frank's Box, but
not the 
same.
Frank, please take a 
look at this, and tell us what  you think.
I don't understand 
how it works......
Deb    


      
--0-560706151-1218546631=:74864
